00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00187 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00188 {
00189     double ans = 0;
00190     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00191     return ans;
00192 }

00206 static R_INLINE double*
00207 apply_perm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00208 {
00209     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[i] = src[perm ? perm[i] : i];
00210     return dest;
00211 }

00225 static R_INLINE double*
00226 apply_iperm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00227 {
00228     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[perm ? perm[i] : i] = src[i];
00229     return dest;
00230 }

00240 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00241 {
00242     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00243     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00244     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00245 }

00260 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00261 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00262 {
00263     int ans = 0, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00264 
00265     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00266         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00267         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00268 
00269         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00270         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00271         nc[i] = nci;
00272         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00273     }
00274     return ans;
00275 }

00286 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00287 {
00288     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), i1 = 1;
00289     int nf = dims[nf_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00290     double *b = RANEF_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00291     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00292     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00293     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00294     R_CheckStack(); 
00295 
00296     if (!SXWT_SLOT(x)) {        /* unweighted LMM */
00297         double *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0};
00298         CHM_DN cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1), sol;
00299         R_CheckStack();
00300                                 /* solve RX beta-hat = del2 */
00301         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, fixef, &i1);
00302         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
00303                         fixef, &i1, one, u, &i1);
00304         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00305             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00306         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00307         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00308         d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00309         d[wrss_POS] = d[disc_POS] = d[pwrss_POS] - d[usqr_POS];
00310     }
00311     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00312                                 /* inverse permutation */
00313     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) b[((int*)L->Perm)[i]] = u[i];
00314     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00315         for (int k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00316             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00317             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i];
00318             for (int kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00319         }
00320         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00321             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, one,
00322                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00323         }
00324     }
00325 }
00326 
00336 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00337 {
00338     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00339         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00340         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)), nf = LENGTH(ST);
00341     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00342         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00343     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00344         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00345         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00346     R_CheckStack();
00347     
00348     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00349     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00350     for (int i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00351     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00352         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00353         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00354             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00355             for (int k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00356                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00357             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00358         }
00359     }
00360     return R_NilValue;
00361 }
00362 
00371 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00372 {
00373     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00374     int nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00375     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00376         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00377         double *st = REAL(STi);
00378         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00379         int ncp1 = nci + 1;
00380 
00381         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00382             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00383         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00384             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00385                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00386     }
00387     return pars;
00388 }

00397 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00398 {
00399     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS]));
00400     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00401 
00402     UNPROTECT(1); 
00403     return ans;
00404 }
00405 
00411 static void update_A(SEXP x)
00412 {
00413     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x), Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
00414     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p),
00415         *zi = (int*)(Zt->i), *zp = (int*)(Zt->p), ncmax,
00416         nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS];
00417     int annz = ap[A->ncol], znnz = zp[Zt->ncol];
00418     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00419     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*), *ax = (double*)(A->x),
00420         *zx = (double*)(Zt->x), one[] = {1,0};
00421     R_CheckStack();
00422 
00423     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00424 
00425     if (annz == znnz) { /* Copy Z' to A unless A has new nonzeros */
00426         Memcpy(ax, zx, znnz);
00427     } else { /* Only for nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00428         AZERO(ax, annz);        /* Initialize potential nonzeros to 0 */
00429         for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00430             int pa = ap[j];
00431             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00432                 while (ai[pa] < zi[p]) pa++;          /* matching pos in A */
00433                 if (ai[pa] != zi[p])
00434                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and A structures, j = %d"), j);
00435                 ax[pa] = zx[p];
00436             }
00437         }
00438     }
00439                                 /* When T != I multiply A on the left by T' */
00440     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00441         for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00442             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1];) {
00443                 int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00444 
00445                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00446                 else {
00447                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00448                     while ((ai[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00449                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00450                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00451                                     one, st[i], nc + i, ax + p, &nr);
00452                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00453                 }
00454             }
00455                                 /* Multiply A on the left by S */
00456     for (int p = 0; p < annz; p++) {
00457         int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00458         ax[p] *= st[i][((ai[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00459     }
00460 }
00461 
00469 static void
00470 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00471 {
00472     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), ncmax, nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS], pos = 0;
00473     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00474     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00475     R_CheckStack();
00476 
00477     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00478                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00479     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00480         int nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00481         double *sti = st[i];
00482 
00483         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00484             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00485         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00486             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00487                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00488     }
00489     update_A(x);
00490 }

00501 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
00502 {
00503     int npar = DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS];
00504 
00505     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00506         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00507     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00508     return R_NilValue;
00509 }
00510 
00518 SEXP mer_ST_chol(SEXP x)
00519 {
00520     SEXP ans = PROTECT(duplicate(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym)));
00521     int ncmax, nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS];
00522     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00523     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00524     R_CheckStack();
00525 
00526     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ans, Gp_SLOT(x), st, nc, nlev);
00527     for (int k = 0; k < nf; k++) {
00528         if (nc[k] > 1) {        /* nothing to do for nc[k] == 1 */
00529             int nck = nc[k], nckp1 = nc[k] + 1;
00530             double *stk = st[k];
00531 
00532             for (int j = 0; j < nck; j++) {
00533                 double dd = stk[j * nckp1]; /* diagonal el */
00534                 for (int i = j + 1; i < nck; i++) {
00535                     stk[j + i * nck] = dd * stk[i + j * nck];
00536                     stk[i + j * nck] = 0;
00537                 }
00538             }
00539         }
00540     }
00541 
00542     UNPROTECT(1);
00543     return ans;
00544 }
00545 
00553 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
00554 {
00555     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00556     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00557     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00558     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
00559     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00560     CHM_DN dm1;
00561     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00562     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00563         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00564     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00565     R_CheckStack();
00566 
00567     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00568     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00569     sc = dims[useSc_POS] ?
00570         (DEV_SLOT(x)[dims[isREML_POS] ? sigmaREML_POS : sigmaML_POS]) : 1;
00571     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00572         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00573         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00574                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00575                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00576 
00577         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00578         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00579         for (int j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00580         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00581             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00582         for (int k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00583             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00584             for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00585                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + k + j * nlev[i]];
00586             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00587             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00588             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00589             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00590             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00591             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00592             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00593             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00594             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00595                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00596                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00597                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00598                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00599             }
00600         }
00601         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00602     }
00603     UNPROTECT(1);
00604     return ans;
00605 }
00606 
00615 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP CmP)
00616 {
00617     double one[] = {1, 0};
00618     CHM_SP Cm = AS_CHM_SP(CmP);
00619     CHM_FR L;
00620     R_CheckStack();
00621 
00622     L = M_cholmod_analyze(Cm, &c);
00623     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Cm, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00624         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00625               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00626 
00627     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00628 }
00629 
00630 
00631 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00632 
00633 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00634 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00635 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00636 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00637 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;
00638 
00651 static void
00652 lme4_muEta(double* mu, double* muEta, const double* eta, int n, int lTyp)
00653 {
00654     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* apply the generalized linear part */
00655         double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00656         switch(lTyp) {
00657         case 1:         /* logit */
00658             tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00659             ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00660             mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00661             muEta[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00662             break;
00663         case 2:         /* probit */
00664             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00665                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00666                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00667             }
00668             mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00669                 ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00670                  pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00671             tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00672             muEta[i] = (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00673             break;
00674         case 3:         /* cauchit */
00675             error(_("cauchit link not yet coded"));
00676             break;
00677         case 4:         /* cloglog */
00678             error(_("cloglog link not yet coded"));
00679             break;
00680         case 5:         /* identity */
00681             mu[i] = eta[i];
00682             muEta[i] = 1.;
00683             break;
00684         case 6:         /* log */
00685             tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00686             muEta[i] = mu[i] =
00687                 (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00688             break;
00689         case 7:         /* sqrt */
00690             mu[i] = etai * etai;
00691             muEta[i] = 2 * etai;
00692             break;
00693         default:
00694             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00695         }
00696     }
00697 }
00698 
00709 static void
00710 lme4_varFunc(double* var, const double* mu, int n, int vTyp)
00711 {
00712     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00713         double mui = mu[i];
00714         switch(vTyp) {
00715         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00716             var[i] = 1.;
00717             break;
00718         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00719             if (mui <= 0 || mui >= 1)
00720                 error(_("mu[i] must be in the range (0,1): mu = %g, i = %d"),
00721                       mu, i);
00722             var[i] = mui * (1 - mui);
00723             break;
00724         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00725             if (mui <= 0)
00726                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00727             var[i] = mui;
00728             break;
00729         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00730             if (mui <= 0)
00731                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00732             var[i] = mui * mui;
00733             break;
00734         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00735             if (mui <= 0)
00736                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00737             var[i] = mui * mui * mui;
00738             break;
00739         default:
00740             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00741         }
00742     }
00743 }
00744 
00753 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00754 {
00755     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00756 }
00757 
00771 static double
00772 lme4_devResid(const double* mu, const double* pWt, const double* y,
00773               int n, int vTyp)
00774 {
00775     double ans = 0.;
00776     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00777         double mui = mu[i], wi = pWt ? pWt[i] : 1, yi = y[i];
00778         double ri = yi - mui;
00779         switch(vTyp) {
00780         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00781             ans += wi * ri * ri;
00782             break;
00783         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00784             ans += 2 * wi *
00785                 (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00786             break;
00787         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00788             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00789             break;
00790         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00791             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui)/mui);
00792             break;
00793         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00794             ans += wi * (ri * ri)/(yi * mui * mui);
00795             break;
00796         default:
00797             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00798         }
00799     }
00800     return ans;
00801 }
00802 
00812 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00813 {
00814     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00815     int i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00816     int ns = n * s;
00817     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = ETA_SLOT(x),
00818         *etaold = (double*) NULL, *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
00819         *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x), *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x),
00820         *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x), *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
00821         *var = VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00822     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00823     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00824     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta, cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
00825     R_CheckStack();
00826 
00827     if (V) {
00828         etaold = eta;
00829         eta = Calloc(ns, double);
00830     }
00831                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00832     for (int i = 0; i < ns; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
00833                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00834     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &ns, &p, one, X_SLOT(x), &ns,
00835                     FIXEF_SLOT(x), &i1, one, eta, &i1);
00836                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00837     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00838     ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, ns, 1);
00839     R_CheckStack();
00840     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00841         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00842     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00843 
00844     if (V) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00845         SEXP pnames = VECTOR_ELT(GET_DIMNAMES(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym)), 1),
00846             gg, rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym), vv;
00847         int *gdims;
00848         
00849         if (!isString(pnames) || LENGTH(pnames) != s)
00850             error(_("Slot V must be a matrix with %d named columns"), s);
00851         for (int i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00852             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00853                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00854             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00855                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00856                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00857             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00858         }
00859         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00860         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00861             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00862         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00863         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00864             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00865         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00866         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00867             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00868                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00869                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00870                                  * pnames has been checked */
00871         Free(eta);
00872         eta = etaold;
00873         Memcpy(eta, REAL(vv), n);
00874         Memcpy(V, REAL(gg), ns);
00875         UNPROTECT(1);
00876     }
00877 
00878     if (muEta) {
00879         lme4_muEta(mu, muEta, eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
00880         lme4_varFunc(var, mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
00881     } else {
00882         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00883     }
00884 
00885     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00886     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00887         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1);
00888         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00889     }
00890                                 /* store u'u */
00891     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00892     d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS];
00893     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00894                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
00895     d[sigmaREML_POS] = (V || muEta) ? NA_REAL :
00896         d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
00897     return d[pwrss_POS];
00898 }
00899 
00910 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00911 {
00912     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00913 }
00914 
00925 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00926 {
00927     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00928     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00929     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00930         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *mu = MU_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
00931         *pwt = PWT_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
00932         *var =  VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00933     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00934     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00935     R_CheckStack();
00936     
00937     if (var || pwt) {      /* Update srwt and res. Reevaluate wrss. */
00938         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00939         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00940             srwt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1.0) / (var ? var[j] : 1.0));
00941             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00942             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00943         }
00944     }
00945     if (sXwt) {                 /* Update sXwt and C */
00946         int *ai = (int*)A->i, *ap = (int*)A->p;
00947         double *ax = (double*)(A->x);
00948         CHM_SP C = A;
00949 
00950         for (int j = 0; j < s; j++) {
00951             for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00952                 int ja = i + j * n;
00953                 sXwt[ja] = (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1) *
00954                     (muEta ? muEta[i] : 1) * (V ? V[ja] : 1);
00955             }
00956         }
00957         if (cx) {               /* C is a scaled version of A */
00958             for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00959                 for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00960                     cx[p] = ax[p] * sXwt[j];
00961             A->x = (void*)cx;
00962         } else {
00963             int *ci, *cp;
00964             C = Cm_SLOT(x);
00965             R_CheckStack();
00966 
00967             ci = (int*)C->i; cp = (int*)C->p; cx = (double*)C->x;
00968             AZERO(cx, cp[n]);
00969             for (int j = 0; j < s; j++)
00970                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00971                     int ja = i + j * n, pc;
00972                     for (int pa = ap[ja]; pa < ap[ja + 1]; pa++) {
00973                         for (pc = cp[i]; pc < cp[i + 1]; pc++)
00974                             if (ci[pc] == ai[pa]) break;
00975                         if (pc >= cp[i + 1])
00976                             error(_("Structure of Cm and A are not consistent"));
00977                         cx[pc] += ax[pa] * sXwt[ja];
00978                     }
00979                 }
00980             A = C;
00981         }
00982     }
00983     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00984         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00985               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00986 
00987     d[ldL2_POS] = M_chm_factor_ldetL2(L);
00988     d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS];
00989     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00990                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
00991     d[sigmaREML_POS] = (V || muEta) ? NA_REAL :
00992         d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
00993     return d[pwrss_POS];
00994 }
00995 
01007 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
01008 {
01009     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
01010 }
01011 
01013 #define CM_MAXITER  300
01014 
01015 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
01016 
01017 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
01018 
01028 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
01029 {
01030     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01031     int i, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01032     double *Cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x),
01033         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x),
01034         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
01035         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, step;
01036     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double), *tmp1 = Alloca(q, double),
01037         *uold = Alloca(q, double), one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01038     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01039     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
01040         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
01041     CHM_SP C = Cm_SLOT(x);
01042     R_CheckStack();
01043     
01044     if (!sXwt) return(0);       /* nothing to do for LMMs */
01045     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
01046     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
01047     if (Cx) {               /* A and C have the same structure */
01048         C = A_SLOT(x);
01049         R_CheckStack();
01050         C->x = (void*)Cx;
01051     }
01052     
01053     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
01054      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
01055      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
01056      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
01057     AZERO(u, q);
01058     update_mu(x);
01059     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
01060         
01061         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
01062         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
01063                                 /* tmp := PC %*% wtdResid */
01064         M_cholmod_sdmult(C, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01065         Memcpy(tmp1, tmp, q);
01066         apply_perm(tmp, tmp1, (int*)L->Perm, q);
01067                                 /* tmp := tmp - u */
01068         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] -= u[j];
01069                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01070         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01071             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01072         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01073         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01074                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01075         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
01076         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01077                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01078         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01079             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01080         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01081         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01082 
01083         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01084             for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
01085             pwrss = update_mu(x);
01086             if (verb < 0)
01087                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01088                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
01089             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
01090                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
01091                 break;
01092             }
01093         }
01094         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01095     }
01096     return i;
01097 }
01098 
01110 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01111 {
01112     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
01113 }
01114 
01115 /* FIXME: change this to use the variance type slot.  If
01116  * dims[useSc_POS] is nonzero then use the formula for the profiled
01117  * deviance.  (Does everything work out nicely if sigma is identically
01118  * 1 when useSc is false?)
01119  */
01120 
01128 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01129 {
01130     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x);
01131     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01132 
01133     d[disc_POS] = MUETA_SLOT(x) ?
01134         lme4_devResid(MU_SLOT(x), PWT_SLOT(x), Y_SLOT(x),
01135                       dims[n_POS], dims[vTyp_POS]) :
01136         d[wrss_POS];
01137     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01138     return R_NilValue;
01139 }
01140 
01151 SEXP mer_update_ranef(SEXP x)
01152 {
01153     update_ranef(x);
01154     return R_NilValue;
01155 }
01156 
01167 static void
01168 P_sdmult(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01169          const double *X, int nc)
01170 {
01171     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), m = A->nrow, n = A->ncol;
01172     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(m, double);
01173     R_CheckStack();
01174 
01175     for (int k = 0; k < nc; k++) {
01176         AZERO(tmp, m);
01177         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01178             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01179                 tmp[ai[p]] += X[j + k * n] * ax[p];
01180         }
01181         apply_perm(dest + k * m, tmp, perm, m);
01182     }
01183 }
01184         
01193 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01194 {
01195     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), i1 = 1, info;
01196     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
01197     double *WX = (double*) NULL, *X = X_SLOT(x), *cx = Cx_SLOT(x),
01198         *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *RZX = RZX_SLOT(x),
01199         *RX = RX_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
01200         *u = U_SLOT(x), *wy = (double*)NULL, *y = Y_SLOT(x),
01201         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p), mone[] = {-1,0},
01202         one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01203     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
01204     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01205     CHM_DN cRZX = N_AS_CHM_DN(RZX, q, p), ans, cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1);
01206     R_CheckStack();
01207 
01208     if (sXwt) {                 /* Create W^{1/2}GHX in WX */
01209         WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
01210 
01211         AZERO(WX, n * p);
01212         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++)
01213             for (int k = 0; k < s; k++)
01214                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
01215                     WX[i + j * n] +=
01216                         sXwt[i + k * n] * X[i + n * (k + j * s)];
01217         X = WX;
01218         /* Replace A by C, either just the x component or the entire matrix */
01219         if (cx) A->x = (void*)cx;
01220         else {
01221             A = Cm_SLOT(x);
01222             R_CheckStack();
01223         }
01224     }
01225                                 /* solve L %*% RZX = PAW^{1/2}GHX */
01226     P_sdmult(RZX, (int*)L->Perm, A, X, p); /* right-hand side */
01227     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRZX, &c); /* solution */
01228     Memcpy(RZX, (double*)(ans->x), q * p);
01229     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01230                                 /* downdate X'X and factor  */
01231     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, one, X, &n, zero, RX, &p); /* X'X */
01232     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &q, mone, RZX, &q, one, RX, &p);
01233     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &p, RX, &p, &info);
01234     if (info)
01235         error(_("Downdated X'X is not positive definite, %d."), info);
01236                                 /* accumulate log(det(RX)^2)  */
01237     d[ldRX2_POS] = 0;
01238     for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(RX[j * (p + 1)]);
01239 
01240     if (V_SLOT(x) || MUETA_SLOT(x)) { /* nonlinear or generalized */
01241         if (WX) Free(WX);
01242         return d[ML_POS];
01243     }
01244                                 /* linear mixed models only */
01245     cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1);
01246     R_CheckStack();
01247                                 /* solve L del1 = PAy */
01248     if (sXwt) {
01249         wy = Calloc(n, double);
01250         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) wy[i] = sXwt[i] * y[i];
01251         y = wy;
01252     }
01253     P_sdmult(u, (int*)L->Perm, A, y, 1);
01254     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cu, &c);
01255     Memcpy(u, (double*)ans->x, q);
01256     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01257                                 /* solve RX' del2 = X'y - RZX'del1 */
01258     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, one, X, &n, y, &i1, zero, fixef, &i1);
01259     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &q, &p, mone, RZX, &q,
01260                     u, &i1, one, fixef, &i1);
01261     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "T", "N", &p, RX, &p, fixef, &i1);
01262     d[pwrss_POS] = sqr_length(y, n)
01263         - (sqr_length(fixef, p) + sqr_length(u, q));
01264     if (d[pwrss_POS] < 0)
01265         error(_("Calculated PWRSS for a LMM is negative"));
01266     d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01267         dn * (1 + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2 * PI / dn));
01268     d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01269         dnmp * (1. + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01270     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
01271                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
01272     d[sigmaREML_POS] = d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
01273 
01274     if (wy) Free(wy);
01275     if (WX) Free(WX);
01276     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01277 }
01278 
01286 SEXP
01287 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01288 {
01289     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01290 }
01291 
01301 SEXP 
01302 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01303 {
01304     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01305     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), verb = asInteger(verbp);
01306     int lmm = !(MUETA_SLOT(x) || V_SLOT(x)), nf = dims[nf_POS];
01307 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe).
01308  * Not really but we do need to profile out the scale parameter when
01309  * useSc is TRUE. */
01310     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01311     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01312     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01313     double *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x);
01314     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01315     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01316         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01317     R_CheckStack();
01318 
01319     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01320     if (!lmm) {
01321         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01322 
01323         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01324         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01325         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01326         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01327     }
01328                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01329     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01330     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01331                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01332     for (int i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01333         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01334     }
01335                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01336     for (int i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01337         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01338         for (int j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01339         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01340     }
01341     do {
01342         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01343 /* FIXME: Change this so that update_dev is always called and that
01344  * function does the selection of methods based on lmm. The Memcpy
01345  * call should always be used but the number of values to copy can be
01346  * zero. */
01347         if (lmm) {
01348             update_L(x);
01349             fx = update_RX(x);
01350         } else {
01351             
01352             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01353             update_u(x, verb);
01354             mer_update_dev(x);
01355             fx = DEV_SLOT(x)[ML_POS];
01356         }
01357         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01358     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01359     update_RX(x);
01360     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01361     return R_NilValue;
01362 }
01363 
01364 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01365 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01366 
01379 static double
01380 *std_rWishart_factor(double nu, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01381 {
01382     int pp1 = p + 1;
01383 
01384     if (nu < (double) p || p <= 0)
01385         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01386 
01387     AZERO(ans, p * p);
01388     for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) {       /* jth column */
01389         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(nu - (double) j));
01390         for (int i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01391             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01392                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01393             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01394             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01395         }
01396     }
01397     return ans;
01398 }
01399 
01409 SEXP
01410 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP nuP, SEXP scal)
01411 {
01412     SEXP ans;
01413     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), info,
01414         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01415     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, nu = asReal(nuP), one = 1, zero = 0;
01416 
01417     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01418         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01419     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01420     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01421     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01422     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01423     R_CheckStack();
01424 
01425     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01426     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01427     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &info);
01428     if (info)
01429         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01430     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01431     ansp = REAL(ans);
01432     GetRNGstate();
01433     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01434         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01435         std_rWishart_factor(nu, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01436         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01437                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01438         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01439                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01440                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01441 
01442         for (int i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01443             for (int k = 0; k < i; k++)
01444                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01445     }
01446 
01447     PutRNGstate();
01448     UNPROTECT(1);
01449     return ans;
01450 }
01451 
01452 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01453 
01465 static void MCMC_beta_u(SEXP x, double sigma, double *fvals, double *rvals)
01466 {
01467     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01468     int i1 = 1, p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01469     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01470         *u = U_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01471     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01472     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01473     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01474     R_CheckStack();
01475 
01476     if (V || muEta) {
01477         error(_("Update not yet written"));
01478     } else {                    /* Linear mixed model */
01479         update_L(x);
01480         update_RX(x);
01481         update_ranef(x);     /* Provides conditional beta-hat and u */
01482                                 /* Update beta */
01483         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01484         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, del2, &i1);
01485         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) fixef[j] += del2[j];
01486                                 /* Update u */
01487         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01488         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
01489                         del2, &i1, one, del1, &i1);
01490         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01491         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01492         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01493         update_mu(x);        /* and parts of the deviance slot */
01494     }
01495     Memcpy(fvals, fixef, p);
01496     if (rvals) {
01497         update_ranef(x);
01498         Memcpy(rvals, RANEF_SLOT(x), q);
01499     }
01500 }
01501 
01511 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals)
01512 {
01513     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
01514     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS], pos = 0;
01515     double *Ptu = Calloc(q, double), *u = U_SLOT(x);
01516     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01517     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01518     R_CheckStack();
01519 
01520     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01521                                 /* inverse permutation of u */
01522     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) Ptu[perm[j]] = u[j];
01523 
01524     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01525         int qi = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01526         double *sti = st[i], *ui = Ptu + Gp[i];
01527 
01528         if (qi == 1) {
01529             *sti *= sqrt(sqr_length(ui, nl)/rchisq((double)nl))/sigma;
01530             vals[pos++] = *sti;
01531         } else {
01532             int info, qisq = qi * qi, qip1 = qi + 1;
01533             double invsigsq = 1/(sigma * sigma), one[] = {1,0}, zer[] = {0,0};
01534 
01535             double *scal = Alloca(qisq, double), *tmp = Alloca(qisq, double);
01536             R_CheckStack();
01537                                 /* scal := crossprod(U_i)/sigma^2 */
01538             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &nl, &invsigsq, ui, &nl,
01539                             zer, scal, &qi); 
01540             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, scal, &qi, &info);
01541             if (info)
01542                 error(_("scal matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
01543             /* solve W_i' B_i = R_i for W_i a random std Wishart factor */
01544             F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "L", "T", "N", &qi, &qi, one,
01545                             std_rWishart_factor((double)(nl - qi + 1), qi, 0, tmp),
01546                             &qi, scal, &qi);
01547                                 /* B_i := T(theta) %*% S(theta) %*% B_i */
01548             for (int k = 0; k < qi; k++)
01549                 for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++)
01550                     scal[j * qi + k] *= st[i][k * qip1];
01551             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", &qi, &qi, one, st[i], &qi, scal, &qi);
01552                                 /* Create the lower Cholesky factor */
01553             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &qi, one, scal, &qi, zer, tmp, &qi); 
01554             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, tmp, &qi, &info);
01555             if (info)
01556                 error(_("crossproduct matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
01557                                 /* Update S_i and T_i */
01558             for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++) vals[pos++] = sti[j * qip1] = tmp[j * qip1];
01559             for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++)
01560                 for (int k = j + 1; k < qi; k++)
01561                     vals[pos++] = sti[j * qi + k] = tmp[j * qi + k]/sti[j * qip1];
01562         }
01563     }
01564     update_A(x);
01565     Free(Ptu);
01566 }
01567 
01576 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP fm)
01577 {
01578     SEXP devsamp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym);
01579     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), nsamp = LENGTH(devsamp);
01580     int n = dims[n_POS], np = dims[np_POS],
01581         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01582     double
01583         *STsamp = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym)),
01584         *d = DEV_SLOT(fm), *dev = REAL(devsamp),
01585         *sig = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sigmaSym),
01586         *fixsamp = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *resamp = RANEF_SLOT(x);
01587 
01588     GetRNGstate();
01589     /* The first column of storage slots contains the fitted values */
01590     for (int i = 1; i < nsamp; i++) {
01591 /* FIXME: This is probably wrong for a model with weights. */
01592         if (sig)                /* update and store sigma */
01593             sig[i] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/rchisq((double)(n + q)));
01594                                 /* update ST and A */
01595         MCMC_ST(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1, STsamp + i * np);   
01596                         /* update L, RX, beta, u, eta, mu, res and d */
01597         MCMC_beta_u(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1, fixsamp + i * p,
01598                     resamp + (resamp ? i : 0) * q); 
01599         dev[i] = d[ML_POS];
01600     }
01601     PutRNGstate();
01602                 /* Restore pars from the first columns of the samples */
01603     ST_setPars(fm, STsamp);
01604     Memcpy(FIXEF_SLOT(fm), fixsamp, p);
01605     update_u(fm, 0);
01606     update_L(fm);
01607     update_RX(fm);
01608     update_ranef(fm);
01609 
01610     return x;
01611 }
01612 
01613 SEXP merMCMC_VarCorr(SEXP x, SEXP typP)
01614 {
01615     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01616         ncs = GET_SLOT(x, install("nc"));
01617     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *Sd = INTEGER(GET_DIM(ST)), *nc = INTEGER(ncs);
01618     int maxnc = 0, nf = LENGTH(ncs), np = Sd[0], nsamp = Sd[1], pos;
01619     double *sig = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sigmaSym);
01620     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nsamp, np + (sig ? 1 : 0)));
01621     double *av = REAL(ans), *STx = REAL(ST);
01622     double *as = av + nsamp * np, *t1, *t2, var;
01623     int *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01624     R_CheckStack();
01625 
01626     for (int j = 0; j < nf; j++) {
01627         nlev[j] = (Gp[j + 1] - Gp[j])/nc[j];
01628         if (maxnc < nc[j]) maxnc = nc[j];
01629     }
01630     if (maxnc > 1) {
01631         t1 = Alloca(maxnc * maxnc, double);
01632         t2 = Alloca(maxnc * maxnc, double);
01633         R_CheckStack();
01634     }
01635     
01636     for (int i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01637         var = 1; pos = 0;
01638         if (sig) var = as[i] = sig[i] * sig[i];
01639         for (int k = 0; k < nf; k++) {
01640             if (nc[k] < 2) {
01641                 double sd = STx[pos + i * np] * sig[i];
01642                 av[i + nsamp * pos++] = sd * sd;
01643             }
01644             else error(_("Code not yet written"));
01645         }
01646     }
01647         
01648     UNPROTECT(1);
01649     return ans;
01650 }
01651                                
01652 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01653 
01654 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01655 #endif  
01656 
01670 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
01671 {
01672     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
01673     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
01674     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
01675         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
01676                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
01677                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
01678     return 0;
01679 }
01680 
01693 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
01694 {
01695     int ll;
01696 
01697     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
01698         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
01699                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
01700     return 0;
01701 }
01702 
01711 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01712 {
01713     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01714         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01715         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01716         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01717         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym), asgnP;
01718     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP), *asgn;
01719     int n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, nfl,
01720         p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01721     int nv = n * s;
01722     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x), A =  A_SLOT(x);
01723     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01724     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01725     R_CheckStack();
01726                                 /* check lengths */
01727     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01728         return mkString(_("Slot ST must have length dims['nf']"));
01729     asgnP = getAttrib(flistP, install("assign"));
01730     if (!isInteger(asgnP) || LENGTH(asgnP) != nf)
01731         return mkString(_("Slot flist must have integer attribute 'assign' of length dims['nf']"));
01732     asgn = INTEGER(asgnP);
01733     nfl = LENGTH(flistP);
01734     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++)
01735         if (asgn[i] <= 0 || asgn[i] > nfl)
01736             return mkString(_("All elements of the assign attribute must be in [1,length(ST)]"));
01737     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01738         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01739     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01740         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01741     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01742         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01743         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01744     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01745         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01746         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01747     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01748         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01749     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01750         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01751     if (A->nrow != q || A->ncol != nv)
01752         return mkString(_("Slot A must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01753     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01754     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01755     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01756     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01757     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01758     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_pWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01759     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01760     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01761     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01762     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01763     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_VSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01764     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01765     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01766     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01767     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RZXSym, q, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01768     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXSym, p, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01769 
01770     nq = 0;
01771     for (int i = 0; i < LENGTH(flistP); i++) {
01772         SEXP fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01773         if (!isFactor(fli))
01774             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01775 /*      nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol)); */
01776     }
01777     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01778         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
01779         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01780         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01781             return
01782                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01783         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01784             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01785     }
01786 #if 0
01787 /* FIXME: Need to incorporate the assign attribute in the calculation of nq */
01788     if (q != nq)
01789         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01790 #endif
01791     return ScalarLogical(1);
01792 }
01793 
01802 SEXP merMCMC_validate(SEXP x)
01803 {
01804     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01805         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01806         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym);
01807     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01808     int nf = dd[nf_POS], np = dd[np_POS], nsamp = LENGTH(devianceP),
01809         p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS];
01810     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01811     R_CheckStack();
01812                                 /* check lengths */
01813     if (nsamp <= 0)
01814         return mkString(_("number of samples must be positive"));
01815     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01816         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01817         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01818     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01819         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01820     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01821         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01822 
01823     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ncSym, nf, 0))
01824         return(mkString(buf));
01825     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sigmaSym, nsamp, !dd[useSc_POS]))
01826         return(mkString(buf));
01827     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_STSym, np, nsamp))
01828         return(mkString(buf));
01829     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, nsamp))
01830         return(mkString(buf));
01831     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)))
01832         if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, nsamp))
01833             return(mkString(buf));
01834     return ScalarLogical(1);
01835 }
01836 
01845 SEXP spR_update_mu(SEXP x)
01846 {
01847     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01848     int n = dims[n_POS];
01849     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = Calloc(n, double), *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
01850         *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
01851         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
01852     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01853     CHM_DN cbeta = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01854         ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, n, 1);
01855     R_CheckStack();
01856     
01857     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
01858     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 1 /* trans */, one, one, cbeta, ceta, &c))
01859         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
01860     lme4_muEta(mu, MUETA_SLOT(x), eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
01861     lme4_varFunc(VAR_SLOT(x), mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
01862 
01863     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
01864     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01865         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * srwt[i];
01866         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
01867     }
01868 
01869     Free(eta);
01870     return R_NilValue;
01871 }
01872 
01873 
01884 SEXP spR_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01885 {
01886     int *zp, m, n, nnz, verb = asInteger(verbP);
01887     double *Zcp, *Ztx, *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01888         *mu = MU_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01889         *pWt = PWT_SLOT(x), *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
01890         *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x), *tmp, *tmp2,
01891         *var = VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), cfac, crit,
01892         one[] = {1, 0}, step, wrss_old, zero[] = {0, 0};
01893     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01894     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01895     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, Zt->ncol, 1), ctmp, sol;
01896     R_CheckStack();
01897     
01898     zp = (int*)Zt->p;
01899     m = Zt->nrow;
01900     n = Zt->ncol;
01901     nnz = zp[n];
01902     Zcp = Calloc(nnz, double);
01903     Ztx = (double*)Zt->x;
01904     tmp = Calloc(m, double);
01905     tmp2 = Calloc(m, double);
01906     ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, m, 1);
01907     cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)m);
01908     R_CheckStack();
01909 
01910     spR_update_mu(x);
01911     for (int i = 0; ; i++) {
01912         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
01913         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01914             srwt[j] = sqrt((pWt ? pWt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
01915             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
01916             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
01917             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++)
01918                 Zcp[p] = srwt[j] * muEta[j] * Ztx[p];
01919         }
01920         Zt->x = (void*)Zcp;
01921         if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Zt, zero, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
01922             error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
01923                   c.status, L->minor, L->n);
01924         wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01925                                 /* tmp := Zt %*% muEta %*% var %*% wtdResid */
01926         M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01927         Memcpy(tmp2, tmp, m);
01928         apply_perm(tmp, tmp2, (int*)L->Perm, m);
01929                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01930         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01931             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01932         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01933         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01934                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01935         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, m) / wrss_old;
01936         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01937                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01938         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01939             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01940         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01941         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01942 
01943         Memcpy(tmp2, fixef, m);
01944         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01945             for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) fixef[j] = tmp2[j] + step * tmp[j];
01946             spR_update_mu(x);
01947             if (verb < 0)
01948                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01949                         i, step, crit, d[wrss_POS], wrss_old, fixef[1], fixef[2]);
01950             if (d[wrss_POS] < wrss_old) {
01951                 wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01952                 break;
01953             }
01954         }
01955         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01956     }
01957     Free(tmp2);
01958     Free(Zcp);
01959     Free(tmp);
01960     return R_NilValue;
01961 }

02015 
02016 static void
02017 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
02018 {
02019     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
02020     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
02021         *w = Alloca(n, double),
02022         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
02023 
02024     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
02025     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
02026     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
02027     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
02028         int i, np1 = n + 1;
02029         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
02030         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
02031     }
02032 }
